import React, { Component } from 'react' import './ShoppingCart.css' import {books} from '../data'; class ShoppingCart extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { Qty:0, data:' ' } } componentWillMount() { let res=localStorage.getItem('BooksIds'); this.state.data=JSON.parse(res); console.log("data in cart:=",this.state.data); } increaseQty = () => { console.log('clicked on the increase button'); this.setState({ Qty: this.state.Qty + 1 }); } render() { return (
